column4: Why sometimes am I not able to open my cdroms either with the button or software eject?
use lsof or fuser to see whats got hold of the device when it happens
also see if umount works...if it fails then the error may elude info...
theres a lazy unmount they say not to use for hard disks etc but dvds and cds shouldnt hurt too much....i think its umount -l  which will kill regardless of use\
